quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First, it would be good if you could make an effort to move north. After that, attempt to take a trip north. And then, go north. With that over with, attempt to go to the east. Okay, and then, venture south. Then, assure that the hatch is wide open. Then, take a trip south. And then, doublecheck that the wooden gate in the chamber is wide open. Then, go to the east. And then, look and see that the pine portal is wide open. After that, make an attempt to travel north. With that over with, ensure that the stone hatch is open. After opening the stone hatch, make an effort to go north. And then, recover the tablet from the recliner. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A standard kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case close by.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The case contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The case is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk in the room.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... trunk?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the sauna. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle.

 You can make out a toolbox.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You are in a garage. It seems to be pretty standard here.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] crate.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The crate is empty![end if] You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a playroom. Let's see what's in here.



 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. An ordinary one.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a counter. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a study. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine portal leading north. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gate leading west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. An ordinary one.

 You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau, which looks standard, nearby.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_6], so there's that.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bench you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gate leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You are in a canteen. A standard one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a pan. The pan is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the pan you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine gateway leading east. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just entered a pantry. You begin looking for stuff.

 [if c_7 is locked]A locked[else if c_7 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] locker is here.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a table. [if there is something on the s_5]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_5]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if] You can make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the rack, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedchamber.

 You can make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer close by.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a couch. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the couch, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You are in a basement.



 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. A standard kind of place.



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You're now in the bar. You begin looking for stuff.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a basket. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_9], so there's that.[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The basket is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a recliner. The recliner is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] The recliner appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedroom.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. An ordinary one.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You're now in the recreation zone. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase here.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
Ah, the studio. This is some kind of studio, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. A normal one.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You're now in a dish-pit.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading north. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine portal leading south.

infos.desc: The tablet is brand new.

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First, it would be good if you could move north. Then, go to the north. After that, take a trip north. After that, make an attempt to head east. That done, travel south. And then, look and see that the hatch inside the office is open. And then, make an effort to head south. With that accomplished, open the wooden gate inside the chamber. Then, go to the east. After that, ensure that the pine portal inside the study is open. And then, head north. Okay, and then, open the stone hatch. Then, make an attempt to go north. After that, take the tablet from the recliner. That's it!
